definition: to harness/to draw (a cart etc)/to drive/to pilot/to sail/to ride/your good self/prefixed word denoting respect (polite 敬辞)
to gallop/speedily/to proceed to/to pilot (ship, plane etc)/to sail
driving under the influence of alcohol (DUI)

sentences.english: His job was to drive a Red Cross truck carrying wounded away from battle.
sentences.chinese: 他在紅十字會的工作是駕駛卡車，將傷患帶離戰場。

sentences.english: In what direction should the pilot head in order to travel due north ?
sentences.chinese: 爲使這架飛機向正北航行，駕駛員應取什麼航向？

sentences.english: Transom mand cockpit components sorted and being moved to the boat.
sentences.chinese: 橫樑和駕駛艙部分排序和被轉移到小船。

sentences.english: The new Air Force chiefs were talking about how awesome drones were.
sentences.chinese: 空軍的新首長正在談論無人駕駛飛機是多麼厲害。

sentences.english: Polit error is the most common cause of plane crashes.
sentences.chinese: 飛機失事最常見的原因是駕駛不當。

sentences.english: Might UAVs eventually replace manned combat aircraft altogether?
sentences.chinese: 那麼無人機是否可能完全替代人工駕駛的戰鬥機？

sentences.english: It was dusk when the hunter drove into the barn and unhitched his horse.
sentences.chinese: 當獵人駕駛入穀倉並且放鬆了他的馬，它是黃昏。

sentences.english: This is particularly noticeable in the winter and when driving lots of short journeys with cold starts.
sentences.chinese: 這在冬季和冷啓動大量的短途駕駛時尤爲明顯。

sentences.english: I succeeded in passing the driving test.
sentences.chinese: 我樂成地經過了駕駛測驗。

sentences.english: Your new driving experience comes from the newly-designed car.
sentences.chinese: 新汽車給您一種新的駕駛感受。

sentences.english: Surgent power output of All New Bora makes your driving pleasure easy on the trigger.
sentences.chinese: 全新寶來澎湃的動力輸出讓您的駕駛樂趣一觸即發。

sentences.english: He wanted to get a license to drive a car.
sentences.chinese: 他想辦一張駕駛汽車的駕駛證。

sentences.english: He wanted to get a license to drive a car.
sentences.chinese: 他想辦一張駕駛汽車的駕駛證。

sentences.english: He flies a motor  glider and small airplanes.
sentences.chinese: 現在他可以駕駛電動滑翔機和小型飛機。

sentences.english: It is insanity to drive a car without any brakes .
sentences.chinese: 駕駛沒有煞車的汽車確是愚不可及。

sentences.english: He drove the police car at full throttle and dashed at the gangsters.
sentences.chinese: 他駕駛着警車開足馬力向匪徒衝去。

definition: to travel along a route (of vehicles etc)
to gallop/speedily/to proceed to/to pilot (ship, plane etc)/to sail
locomotive/train engine car/scooter (Tw)/(slang) (Tw) hard to get along with/a pain in the ass/damn!/crap!
